name: Create a Quote with Google Docs for each new row in Google Sheets.
description: For each new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a Quote with Google Docs. The template uses this [example Spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18tuKaQV_8cyehugArbU0K7YOAVzWfwjavF9z1URt1Dw/edit?usp=sharing) and this [example Google Doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hhH1H1oH9j4eAu6QxHYM_q0XB3S4cKbPoWAK41cRndM/edit?usp=sharing).
